entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 1:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: E 45 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with light snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
